title: Skype problems while in game
body: okay so basically whenever im in game with my friend and we are skyping the instant we get into the actual game their audio through the call goes all tinny and quiet, any reason or solution to this?

replies.body:
Some VOIP's (Voice over IP) such as Skype will automatically enable a certain feature in Windows that reduces the sounds of other apps when in a call/voice chat. I recommend following [this guide](https://www.tekrevue.com/tip/windows-reducing-system-volume/) to disable this feature.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
This also happens with using FaceTime on a Mac.

I wasn't able to find a solution for this online. Since this happens with an application made by Apple themselves, I recommend reaching out to them about this. Here's a link to their [support page](https://support.apple.com/).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}just go in ur sound settings and turn the volume up?
